name: Cinnamon Sparkle

ingredients.item: Flor de Caña 7-Year-Old Grand Reserve Rum

preparation:
In a mixing glass, muddle the sugar cubes in the club soda until dissolved.
Stir in the remaining ingredients, except for the wine, one at a time.
Fill with ice and continue stirring until chilled.
Strain into a coupe or punch glass and top with the wine.
Garnish with a cinnamon stick.
